creator: danny@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 23552
Patch to allow branches to be compared as well as tags

Patch supplied allows all combinations of branches, tags or trunk to be compared.
It is fully compatible with older configuration.
Also attached is the whole source file, as the diff is pretty comprehensive.

Created attachment 23553
Full source of change to allow branches to be compared as well as tags

adding src as well as diff
creator: danny@apache.org

text: svn revision 771731 fixes a small backwards incompatibility when dealing with implicit trunk values (the original patch wouldn't contain a to* attribute in the generated diff).
creator: bodewig@apache.org
